problem_text: Prove that every countable group can act faithfully as a group of automorphisms of a finitely generated soluble group (of derived length at most 4). For background to this problem, in particular its relationship with problem 8.50, see (P. M. Neumann, in: Groups–Korea, Pusan, 1988 (Lect. Notes Math., 1398), Springer, Berlin, 1989, 124–139). P. M. Neumann
